import React, { Component } from 'react' import './App.css' import '../assets/css/bootstrap.min.css' import '../assets/css/font-awesome.css' import next from '../assets/images/next.svg' import phone from '../assets/images/mail_white.svg' import dcl from '../assets/mockups/dcl_home.PNG' import safe from '../assets/mockups/safe_home.png' import covid from '../assets/images/Covid.png' import sparq from '../assets/images/SparQ.png' import sayblue from '../assets/images/sayblue.jpg' import Slider from "react-slick"; import "slick-carousel/slick/slick.css"; import "slick-carousel/slick/slick-theme.css"; export class PortSlider extends Component { render() { var settings = { dots: false, infinite: true, speed:60000, autoplay:true, cssEase:'linear', autoplaySpeed:0, slidesToShow: 3, slidesToScroll: 6, }; return (
) } } export default PortSlider
